head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GROVEMAN, MARILYN ASTOR

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GROVEMAN, MARILYN ASTOR

block.p: GROVEMAN--Marilyn Astor, of Scarsdale, NY, and Boca Raton, FL. Beloved wife to the late Aaron Groveman, died peacefully Friday morning, January 5, 2007, in Boca Raton, FL, at the age of 74. Marilyn is survived by her daughter Nancy, her two sons, Alex and David, her daughter Jane, close family friend, Richard and scores of life long friends. Marilyn's gracious and loving nature made all feel welcome and comfortable. She will be missed.
